Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Aloft London Excel in London (Canary Wharf), you'll be convenient to Excel Exhibition Centre and O2 Arena. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Emirates Air Line Royal Docks Station and Thames Barrier.

Rooms
Stay in one of 252 guestrooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access is available. Bathrooms feature showers with rainfall showerheads. Conveniences include irons/ironing boards, housekeeping is provided daily, and cribs/infant beds (complimentary) can be requested.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Be sure to enjoy recreational amenities including an indoor pool and a fitness center.

Dining
You can enjoy a meal at a restaurant serving the guests of Aloft London Excel, or stop in at a snack bar/deli. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access, a computer station, and express check-in. This hotel has 6 meeting rooms available for events. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is noon
You can enjoy a meal at a restaurant serving the guests of Aloft London Excel, or stop in at a snack bar/deli. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Be sure to enjoy recreational amenities including an indoor pool and a fitness center.

Conveniences include irons/ironing boards, housekeeping is provided daily, and cribs/infant beds (complimentary) can be requested.

With a stay at Aloft London Excel in London (Canary Wharf), you'll be convenient to Excel Exhibition Centre and O2 Arena. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Emirates Air Line Royal Docks Station and Thames Barrier.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Excel Exhibition Centre - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Emirates Air Line Royal Docks Station - 1.2 km / 0.8 mi
Thames Barrier - 1.5 km / 1 mi
Emirates Air Line Greenwich Peninsula Station - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi
The Valley - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi
O2 Arena - 2.5 km / 1.5 mi
Boleyn Ground Stadium - 2.7 km / 1.7 mi
Royal Artillery Barracks - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi
One Canada Square - 3.8 km / 2.4 mi
University of Greenwich - 4 km / 2.5 mi
Queen's House - 4 km / 2.5 mi
National Maritime Museum - 4.1 km / 2.6 mi
Cutty Sark - 4.2 km / 2.6 mi
Museum of London Docklands - 4.2 km / 2.6 mi
Royal Observatory - 4.2 km / 2.6 mi

The nearest airports are:
London (LCY-London City) - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
London (LHR-Heathrow) - 33.9 km / 21 mi

The preferred airport for Aloft London Excel is London (LHR-Heathrow).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Message.Text: Important notices: In case of any amendment please contact us to check the rates and conditions as these could change - Hotel will invoice the total amount of this booking in case of no show / En caso de modificacion, por favor contacten con nosotros para verificar las tarifas y condiciones de la reserva ya que podrian ser diferentes - En caso de no show el hotel se reserva el derecho de aplicar gastos del 100%
